// for tutorial/showcase Promo Grid Tutorial Promo Grid Hints First, add people using the Add People button. Next, establish ratings for each one using the Evaluate People button. Finally, see which ones are ready for promotion using the See Results button. When this tutorial is over, it will be toggled off. Use the options menu to turn it back on. Add people using the New button here. A screen will be presented allowing you to enter basic info for that person. You can evaluate them one at a time using the check box icon on this screen, or return to the main menu and use the Evaluate People button to go through them all. Rate each person according to a set of questions here. Just select a name and a series of questions will be presented. The icon on the right indicates your progress. A check mark means you\'re done with that person. Just hit Done to return to the main screen when you\'re done. Respond to questions here. Use the slider to provide a response from 1 (low) to 10 (high). Try to answer each question indepently of the others (not what you think the final rating should be). Hit the Next Question button to move to the next question. After each person is evaluated, they will be represented on this report. The ones in the upper right quadrant are the ones to consider for promotion. Use the Save Report button to save (or print) the report to your device. Note the directory and file name so you can e-mail it to yourself or others. Next Got It
